zone.line: It climbs the crags of life, step after step,
Which wounds it, as ice wounds unsandalled feet 15
It yet remains supreme o'er misery
Aspiring ..unrepressed; yet soon to fall:
Even now have I begotten, thea strange might,wonder
That fatal child, the terror of the Earth,
Who waits but till the destined Hours arrive 20
Bearing from Demogorgons vacant throne
The dreadful robe mightof ever living limbs
Which clothed that shadowy awfulspirit unbeheld—
He shall descend & To redescendtrample out the spark...
Pour forth Heavens wine Idæan Ganymede
And let it fill the dædal cups like fire
And from the flower-inwoven soil of Heavendivine
Let the Ye alltriumphant harmonies arise
As dew from the Earth beneath underthe twilightstars;
Drink, be the nectar living circlingthro your veins 30
The soul of joy, ye everliving Gods
Till exultation burst in one wide voice
Like music from Elysians winds.— & thou
